name: anytype
title: Anytype
description: Search, create and interact with Anytype - right at your fingertips, anywhere on your Mac.
author: jmetrikat

commands.name: search-anytype
commands.title: Search Anytype
commands.subtitle: Anytype
commands.description: Search across all your Anytype spaces and objects.

commands.name: browse-spaces
commands.title: Browse Spaces
commands.subtitle: Anytype
commands.description: Browse your Anytype spaces one by one.

commands.name: chat
commands.title: Chat
commands.subtitle: Anytype
commands.description: Chat and collaborate within your Anytype spaces.

commands.name: create-object
commands.title: Create Object
commands.subtitle: Anytype
commands.description: Create a new Anytype object in any of your spaces.

commands.name: create-space
commands.title: Create Space
commands.subtitle: Anytype
commands.description: Create a new Anytype space to organize or collaborate.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
